text: Ayatollah Abbas Vaez Tabasi (, 25 June 1935 â€“ 4 March 2016) was an Iranian cleric. He holds memberships at different institutions. He was the Grand Imam and Chairman of the Astan Quds Razavi board from 1979 until his death in 2016. He was born in Tabas, Mashhad. Tabasi died from respiratory failure in Mashhad, Iran on 4 March 2016. He had lung cancer. Tabasi was aged 80. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Website * BBC article about Naser Vaez-Tabasi Category:1935 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Iranian clerics
title: Abbas Vaez-Tabasi
